articles.description: Many users have been reporting issues with the Microsoft Rewards app on Xbox since late yesterday, and sure enough, we can't get the darn thing to play nice either.
articles.content: Many users have been reporting issues with the Microsoft Rewards app on Xbox since late yesterday, and sure enough, we can't get the darn thing to play nice either. Folks on Reddit, Twitter, and our … [+1260 chars]
